context: What three negative effects of vaccination are mentioned on the Internet?
answer: Vaccination is a powerful weapon in our fight against monsters that many of us have already forgotten. The biggest side effects of vaccinations are a reduction in the number of dead children. And an allergic reaction that can lead to permanent hearing loss. And the worst side effect of measles is Encephalitis. So if we vaccinate 10,000,000 children, a total of 120 of them will have more serious side effects. Up to 100 or 0.001% may have a serious allergic reaction that needs to be treated. Up to 10 children or 0.0001%, may have the worst side effect: Encephalitis.
